content.title: Last Chance! Project Closes in Less than 35 hours.
content.creator:
Pandoranium
February 28, 2025
content.content:
We're In The Last 35 Hours Now
Once again, I thank you all for the support. The stretch goals are also ready. There will be a survey send to you by Kickstarter to obtain the email address (or gmail) to allow us to share the Google Drive link with you. Your rewards (3D Models Digital File For 3D Printing) will be in there.

content.title: Fully Funded & Stretch Goal
content.creator:
Pandoranium
February 7, 2025
content.content:
First of all, thank you for all your support that this project has reached its goal and fully funded. On top of that we've reached our first stretch goal.
We will begin to design the "Variant King" now and provide an update when it's done.
